title: IP boosts not in store?
body: So I am playing on a newer account but I have been playing since season 5 and my new account does not have many champions right now. I went to the store to buy IP boosts so I can buy champs so I can play ranked but there is nothing there and I am not sure why. Anyone have any sort of explanation for this? Thanks!

replies.body: We talked about this a little in one of the recent [**Ask Riot's**](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards/), but essentially we didn't want someone to buy a boost and then not be able to use all of it.
